resources.name: Get current user profile
resources.description: Retrieve the profile information and preferences of the currently authenticated user

resources.name: Filter expenses (max 20)
resources.description: Return the filtered expenses for the authenticated user

resources.name: List open reports (max 10)
resources.description: Fetch up to 10 expense reports that are still in 'Open' status and awaiting submission or approval

resources.name: List expense categories
resources.description: Return all available expense categories that the user can select when creating a new expense

resources.name: List payment methods
resources.description: Retrieve the list of allowed payment methods (e.g. company card, cash, mileage) configured for the organisation

resources.name: List supported currencies
resources.description: Get all currencies supported by the organisation’s Declaree environment, including their ISO codes and exchange-rate settings

resources.name: List active expense policies
resources.description: Show all active expense policies so users can quickly review the rules and limits that apply to their claims

resources.name: List cost centers (max 30)
resources.description: Return up to 30 cost centers that users can assign to expenses for allocation purposes

resources.name: List projects (max 30)
resources.description: Retrieve up to 30 active projects that expenses can be booked against

resources.name: List organisation users (max 50)
resources.description: List up to 50 users within the organisation—useful for selecting colleagues when setting approvers or delegating

resources.name: List reports awaiting approval (max 10)
resources.description: Fetch up to 10 reports currently waiting for manager approval, so approvers can see what needs their action

resources.name: List recent reimbursements (max 10)
resources.description: Show the filtered reimbursements paid out to the user

resources.name: List recent attachments (max 20)
resources.description: Retrieve the 20 most recent receipt images or other files uploaded by the user

resources.name: List tax rates
resources.description: Return all tax (VAT) rates configured in Declaree, helpful when reviewing how tax is applied to expenses

resources.name: List mileage rates
resources.description: Get the current mileage reimbursement rates per vehicle type defined by the organisation

resources.name: List per-diem rates
resources.description: Retrieve the per-diem allowance rates table used for travel expense claims

resources.name: List recent notifications (max 20)
resources.description: Return up to 20 most recent system or workflow notifications for the current user
